{{cpp/filesystem/directory_iterator/title | operator*|operator-&gt;}}
{{cpp/filesystem/directory_iterator/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl | num=1 | since=c++17 |
const std::filesystem::directory_entry&amp; operator*() const;
}}
{{dcl | num=2 | since=c++17 |
const std::filesystem::directory_entry* operator-&gt;() const;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Accesses the pointed-to {{ltt|cpp/filesystem/directory_entry}}.

The result of {{tt|operator*}} or {{tt|operator-&gt;}} on the end iterator is undefined behavior.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
@1@ Value of the {{ltt|cpp/filesystem/directory_entry}} referred to by this iterator.
@2@ Pointer to the {{ltt|cpp/filesystem/directory_entry}} referred to by this iterator.

{{cpp/impldef exception}}
